parse.title: The Children of Húrin: Deluxe Edition

wikitext.*:
{{book
|title=The Children of Húrin: Deluxe Edition
| image = Children-of-hurin-deluxe-edition-w-stamp.jpg
|author=[[J.R.R. Tolkien]], edited by [[Christopher Tolkien]], illustrated by [[Alan Lee]]
|isbn=0618904417
|publisher=[[HarperCollins]], [[Houghton Mifflin]]
|date=May 17, 2007
|format=Hardcover with slipcase
|pages=320
}}
'''''The Children of Húrin: Deluxe Edition''''' is the special edition of ''[[The Children of Húrin]]'' which was released at the same time. It is the same as the regular edition with the exception that it is bound in higher quality material and comes in a slipcase with a gold foil stamp.

[[HarperCollins]] printed 10,000 copies of the deluxe edition.

[[Christopher Tolkien]] signed approximately 900 adhesive book plates which have been glued to some copies of this deluxe edition.
